abilities.name: Firestarter
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may attach a Fire Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Benched Pokémon. This power can't be used if Typhlosion is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Evaporating Heat
attacks.effect: Discard a Water Energy attached to the Defending Pokémon.
